IMPORTANT NOTICE
Some members in Region I have reported
that they did not receive a copy of the
attached. Since an error in mailing
might have occurred, we are sending
this second notice. If you did not reÂ¬
ceive the first notice and would like
to make a nomination at this time, will
you please send it to Headquarters not
later than October 9, 1957 ?
HEH:jg - 9/24/57
